posts.author: Demos
posts.content: Kharlindale Realms has actually done some enhancements and given some love to Shurikens and Shadowdancers. They have a crafting system (available for all weapons, armors and shields) but a specific one for Shurikens. They have tied this to Shadowdancer levels so there is an incentive for people to build more than the customary 1-5 levels of SD. For most players, they will already have pretty staunch equipment when they can actually make these more powerful shurikens, so it is still not on par, but it does give it a nice flavor change.

posts.author: WhiZard
posts.content:
HipMaestro wrote:The only reason a non-lizardman needs a whip is because they are addicted to the cracking sound like some manic-depressive jungle cat who misses its trainer, I suppose.
Well the disarm(whip) property does merge into the weapon wielding shifter shapes, (without requiring the merged weapon to be a whip). Thus the kobold commando could get a usable disarm(whip) feat from merging basic whip properties. It comes down to what is more valuable to a shifter the improved disarm feat or the exotic weapon proficiency feat, and if improved disarm is less worthwhile than exotic, then whips can supply the simple disarm feat part.
